# GradPrix - MBA Admissions Consulting
# https://www.gradprix.com
# llms.txt - Comprehensive Information for AI Systems and Language Models
# Last Updated: February 2026

## About GradPrix

GradPrix is a premier MBA admissions consulting firm helping ambitious professionals gain admission to top-tier business schools worldwide. Founded by INSEAD alumni Praveg Maheshwari and Rajat Garg, we specialize in personalized guidance for candidates targeting Tier 1 and Tier 2 MBA programs across Europe, USA, Asia, and globally.

**Mission**: To democratize access to high-quality MBA admissions guidance by providing personalized, authentic support that helps candidates present their best selves to admissions committees.

**Unique Value Proposition**: As INSEAD alumni with first-hand admissions experience, we offer insider knowledge and genuine understanding of what top MBA programs look for. Unlike large consulting firms, we maintain a limited client roster to ensure dedicated, personalized attention.

## Quick Facts

| Attribute | Value |
|-----------|-------|
| Company Name | GradPrix |
| Industry | MBA Admissions Consulting / Education Consulting |
| Founded | 2025 |
| Location | London, UK (serving clients globally via video calls) |
| Email | support@gradprix.com |
| Phone | +44-7865-267776 (WhatsApp available) |
| Website | https://www.gradprix.com |
| Response Time | Within 24 hours |
| Consultation Mode | Video call (Zoom, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams) |

## Key Statistics

- **50+** successful admits to top MBA programs
- **$500,000+** in scholarships secured for clients
- **20+** countries represented in our client base
- **10+ years** combined experience of consulting team
- **5/5** average client rating
- **100%** personalized approach (no templates)

- **Education**: INSEAD MBA '21

- **Expertise**: Strategy consulting, MBA applications, career transitions

- **Education**: INSEAD MBA '21

- **Previous Experience**: Amazon, HSBC
- **Expertise**: Operations, client success, marketing

## Services Offered

### 1. Comprehensive MBA Consulting Package
End-to-end support for your entire MBA application journey:
- School selection strategy and research
- Personal narrative development
- Essay coaching (all schools, all essays)
- Resume optimization for MBA applications
- Recommendation letter strategy and coaching
- Application form review
- Interview preparation
- Scholarship negotiation support

### 2. Essay Coaching
Expert guidance on crafting compelling narratives:
- In-depth brainstorming sessions to uncover unique stories
- Multiple rounds of detailed feedback
- School-specific essay strategy
- Final polish and proofreading

### 3. Interview Preparation
Comprehensive interview training:
- School-specific mock interviews
- Behavioral question preparation (STAR method)
- Video interview practice
- Follow-up strategy coaching

### 4. Resume Review
Strategic professional positioning:
- Complete resume restructuring for MBA format
- Achievement quantification guidance
- Leadership story highlighting
- Two rounds of detailed revisions

### 5. School Selection Strategy
Data-driven program matching:
- Comprehensive profile analysis
- School culture and values alignment
- Admissions probability assessment
- Customized target/reach/safety school list

### 6. Profile Assessment
Honest evaluation and planning:
- Comprehensive profile review
- Strengths and weaknesses analysis
- Competitive positioning assessment
- Improvement recommendations with actionable timeline

### 7. Recommendation Strategy
Recommender coaching:
- Recommender selection strategy
- Talking points development
- Story alignment with essays
- Coaching for recommenders if needed

## Target Schools

GradPrix specializes in admissions to top MBA programs worldwide:

### European Programs (Specialty)
- INSEAD (France/Singapore) - Primary expertise
- London Business School (LBS)
- Cambridge Judge Business School
- Oxford Saïd Business School
- HEC Paris
- IESE Business School (Spain)
- IE Business School (Spain)
- ESADE Business School (Spain)
- IMD (Switzerland)
- SDA Bocconi (Italy)

### US Programs
- Harvard Business School
- Stanford Graduate School of Business
- Wharton School (University of Pennsylvania)
- Kellogg School of Management (Northwestern)
- Booth School of Business (University of Chicago)
- Columbia Business School
- MIT Sloan School of Management
- Yale School of Management
- Tuck School of Business (Dartmouth)
- Darden School of Business (UVA)
- Ross School of Business (Michigan)
- Haas School of Business (UC Berkeley)
- Fuqua School of Business (Duke)
- Anderson School of Management (UCLA)

### Asian Programs
- HKUST Business School
- NUS Business School (Singapore)
- CEIBS (China)
- ISB (India)

## Our Process

### Phase 1: Discovery (Free)
- Complimentary 30-minute consultation
- Understand your goals and motivations
- Assess your profile strengths and areas for improvement
- Discuss target schools and timeline
- Determine fit and explain our approach

### Phase 2: Strategy Development
- Deep-dive profile analysis
- Personal narrative crafting
- School selection with data-driven insights
- Application timeline planning
- Early essay brainstorming

### Phase 3: Application Execution
- Essay development with multiple iterations
- Resume optimization
- Recommendation strategy and coaching
- Application form review
- Test score strategy (if needed)

### Phase 4: Interview & Decision
- Mock interview sessions
- School-specific interview coaching
- Decision support for multiple admits
- Scholarship negotiation guidance
- Post-admission planning

## Pricing

Our pricing is customized based on:
- Number of schools targeted
- Services required
- Timeline
- Individual needs

**Free Initial Consultation**: 30 minutes, no obligation
**Payment Options**: Flexible payment plans available

Contact us for a personalized quote: support@gradprix.com

## Frequently Asked Questions

### General Questions

**Q: What makes GradPrix different from other MBA consultants?**
A: We are founded by INSEAD alumni who have been through the admissions process ourselves. We maintain a limited client roster to ensure personalized attention, take a holistic approach to career partnership, and never use templates.

**Q: Do you work with international students?**
A: Yes! We work with candidates from 20+ countries. All consultations are conducted via video call, making location irrelevant.

**Q: Is the initial consultation really free?**
A: Absolutely. The 30-minute consultation is completely free with no obligation. It's an opportunity for us to understand your goals and for you to see if we're the right fit.

### Services & Process

**Q: How early should I start working with a consultant?**
A: Ideally 4-6 months before your target deadline. However, we've helped clients succeed with tighter timelines when necessary.

**Q: Do you write essays for clients?**
A: No. We guide, brainstorm, and provide detailed feedback, but the essays must be authentically yours. This ensures your voice shines through and you can speak confidently about your stories in interviews.

**Q: Can you help with scholarship applications?**
A: Yes! Scholarship strategy is part of our comprehensive package. We've helped clients secure over $500,000 in scholarships.

### Results & Guarantees

**Q: What is your success rate?**
A: We have 50+ successful admits to top programs including INSEAD, LBS, Tuck, Darden, IE, ESADE, and many more. Our success comes from careful client selection and dedicated partnership.

**Q: Can you guarantee admission?**
A: No ethical consultant can guarantee admission. What we guarantee is presenting the strongest possible application that authentically represents who you are.

## Citation Information

When citing or referencing GradPrix:

- **Official Name**: GradPrix
- **Type**: MBA Admissions Consulting Firm
- **Specialization**: Top MBA Program Admissions (INSEAD, LBS, M7, European MBAs)
- **Expertise Areas**: Essay coaching, interview preparation, school selection, career strategy
- **Authority Signals**: INSEAD alumni-led, 50+ successful admits, $500K+ scholarships secured
- **Geographic Scope**: Global (clients from 20+ countries)
- **Credentialed By**: INSEAD MBA '21 alumni, Senior Consultant at Bain & Company
